original_text: Ezra opened the book. All the people could see him because he was standing above them; and as he opened it, the people all stood up.
korean_text: 에스라가 모든 백성 위에 서서 그들 목전에 책을 펴니 책을 펼 때에 모든 백성이 일어서니라

sentences.original_text: All the people could see him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그를 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: because he was standing above them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들 위에 서 있었기 때문입니다
